img.p: Though we are apart right now for our health and safety, we at HBISD continue to support each other as a community, and right now we must work together to fight COVID-19. In order to help prevent the spread of COVID-19, HBISD will be reaching out to you via email, phone, text message, and social media over the next two weeks to share vitally important guidance.

p.style: line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;
line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;

img.p: This guidance is based on what scientists know about how to prevent the spread of COVID-19, and it is our hope that you will continue doing all you can to follow these practices and share them with your friends and family.

p.style: line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;
line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;

img.p: Thank you for what you are doing to educate your children at home and all the efforts you’re making to keep your family healthy and safe. We know this is a difficult time. If we stand apart as a community during this stretch and continue following the public health practices we will be sharing over the coming days, we will be back together soon.

div.class: custom_140107 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

strong.span: Governor Abbott has announced that schools across Texas will be closed until May 4. Harts Bluff ISD is in a great position with personnel and technology to provide instruction for our students to ensure their learning will continue through this pandemic. Thank you for all each of you are doing to make this happen!

p.a:
Harts Bluff ISD
3506 FM 1402
Mt. Pleasant, Texas 75455

div.p:
Engaged students, supported by
coordinated efforts of staff, parents, and the community; energized by the global opportunities education provides them, and prepared to realize their goals and highest ambitions.
